text: phoenix triton king -lrb- pictured -rrb- was arrested along with the unidentified girl . a man and a 16-year-old girl are on the loose in northern california after shooting two transients , one fatally , with a crossbow . deputies responded to a report of an injured man on the side of a road in eureka around 12:30 p.m. sunday , humboldt county sheriff 's lt. dave morey said . they found the 41-year-old male victim suffering from three crossbow injuries . he was treated and released at a hospital . morey identified the male suspect as 20-year-old phoenix triton king . the girl 's identity was not released . the second victim , a 44-year-old man , was found dead nearneither victim has been identified . morey says it appears king and the girl , also transients , suspected the two men had stolen from their transient camp .
summary: a 44-year-old man was killed and another man , 41 , found with three crossbow injuries .   suspect named as phoenix triton king , the female has not been named .
